website_summaries.verdict: Best hamper on the market, but it is expensive. Looks great and its clever design makes presorting of laundry easy.
pros: Large and divided so presorting lights and darks is easy
Comes in two colors (espresso or honey) and is made of natural fibers
Looks great as far as laundry hampers go
cons: Expensive and bulky, so you'll need a lot of room for it

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I realize this was a natural fiber, but it looked as if something (insect) had been infesting and eating the fibers. There was a gross white powder on it as well, I got splinters when I ran my hand across it. Yuck! It looks so nice in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carrella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hamper delivers!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this week, but I didn’t notice any of the complaints I’d read about. Very sturdy, canvas bags washed well and fit/hang great, and looks beautiful. No odor and well put together. It’s expensive for a hamper is the only knock on this one so far, but looks so much nicer than my previous plastic, broken lid hamper. Haven’t rated durability as can’t gauge that in just a few days. It comes complete so expect a very large box. Love two separate canvas bags to sort clothes, and lid stays up when opened without holding.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews for this kind of product but here goes... For years we've had those cheap plastic laundry hampers and I wanted something better. This hamper is better in every way! It holds lots of laundry, is nice and sturdy and easy to carry to the washer. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey greene

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Good Looking, and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This basket is not only practicial, but very good looking and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: jyg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hamper
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the dark hamper, but it didn't match our decor, so I reluctantly went with the lighter one. Still, it's gorgeous. We have an old historic house and we're trying to decorate it with antiques and old fashioned looking things. This hamper can look modern or old fashioned depending on what else is in the room. I highly recommend it. My only complaint is that the wood rods slip out too easily, but this is a small thing that doesn't bother me much, so no stars removed.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Ibis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite laundry basket of all time!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite laundry basket of all time! Each side holds a giant load of laundry. We needed a basket that could look nice in a common area, and most people don't even realize what it is. It is sturdy and holds up to use by families with kids. The bags inside are easily washable. It still smells nice months later and the family has gotten used to sorting between lights and darks. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: R. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but 100% worth it. Comes already assembled. I've had it for about a month now and I'm still very satisfied with the look and feel. Removal of the clothing bag is simple and they are easy to drop back in. This basket is very very sturdy. Unfortunately mine arrived a little warped on one end therefore it sticks up 1/2 an inch on the left side and does not close all the way. However minor flaw - this item is also too bulky to send back easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hamper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this everything about this hamper....from the looks, the sturdiness, the handles on each side, to the removable cloth bins! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tamra R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Large Hamper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper! The 2 compartments are a definite plus and a hard find. This large hamper easily holds 1 weeks worth of laundry including sheets and towels. Very sturdy, good quality. I was a little hesitant to purchase this product because of the price but you do get what you pay for. It is very nice looking and has no odor. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Just the best.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The corners are square, the lines are plumb, and the top is level. Nothing is out of whack. There is a nice finish on the woven material (which is natural). Both of my kitties love the smell but have zero interest in sharpening their claws on it. (One of them sleeps on it, so I would know!) And I can't believe how much laundry it holds! I never thought I would spend this much on a laundry hamper, but I'm just thrilled with it. I'll have it for years. Don't look any further, this is the one! Even my husband loves it, and he's a real tightwad ;-)
customer_reviews.author: rosemck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, large hamper
customer_reviews.text: I'm beyond pleased with this purchase (and am purchasing a second one). Firstly, it came on time and packaged extremely well. The hamper is even prettier in person than the photo on Amazon. It's a very well made, sturdy piece. Couldn't be happier. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dmwalker

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome hamper. The removable liners are very good quality and the overall hamper construction is excellent and very sturdy. The dark color I chose fits in very well with my bedroom suite and it looks very stylish where it sits in the bedroom. There is no odor from the Abaca fiber it is made of. I completely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Fourie

customer_reviews.title: The best divided hamper I found after hours of searching (on ...
customer_reviews.text: The best divided hamper I found after hours of searching (on the Internet and in stores) and looks as good in real life as in the photos. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Concolato

customer_reviews.title: Rustic for sure
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea and I love the look - but wooden dowel supports are cheap feeling and slide around - making it hard to hang the laundry bags in position. Bought because of all the great reviews, but would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: My refund was processed immediately after shipping and I received the correct hamper in an amazing short time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Oversized Divided Hamper for a Christmas gift and received a different hamper. I returned it and reordered the Oversized Hamper. My refund was processed immediately after shipping and I received the correct hamper in an amazing short time. I can't comment on the quality of the hamper since it is still in the box until Christmas, but I can't say enough about the great customer service I received. We opened the top of the box to see the hamper and it does appear to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Large well constructed divided hamper.
customer_reviews.text: Large well constructed divided hamper. An individual liner for each side, suspended on hangers, make it easy to lift out bag of dirty laundry. The built in hand holds for moving the hamper are good, just wish a hand hold had been placed in the lid making it easier to open. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Forward Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Size great, but poor quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the size of the hamper, the weave of the hamper is very uneven and left many ends sticking out in many places both inside and outside which could potentially snag knit clothing. Taking out the Liners is a little awkward; but I imagine once using it, you would get used to how to lift them out more easily. I don't think it is very well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, practical places to put dirty clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product, for a month or so, so I can't speak to it's long-term durability. But, I have found it and matching products very attractive and durable. Some other reviews report problems with an odor, durability and worse. I simply have not experienced any problems of this kind. I find it and matching items attractive, and have not been disappointed in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was slightly disappointed by the product
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and I had high expectations for the hamper. I was slightly disappointed by the product. The lid on top has a manufacture defect or is damaged before or during the shipping. The lid rests fine on one end but it doesn't rest the same way on the other end and the lid seems to be heaved. I would be interested in seeing if BirdRock is willing to replace the product or give some credit back. Photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are incredibly nice!
customer_reviews.text: These hampers are extra nice. The colors are more espresso than yellow and the sacks inside are really good quality. My only complaint are the rods that hold the sack in place; they feel cheap and brittle. They can be easily replaced. The rest of this hamper is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was a bit disappointed, seems much more flimsy than I expected for this price. The lid seems like it will break if I open it and close it too much which I need to do to use it, and it had a very strong chemical smell. Looks nice but just doesn’t seem as well made as I had thought. I was expecting something more higher end.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My linen closet was about to explode. I was looking for a cabinet to store and organize sets of sheets and this is perfect having two separate liners. I now have flannel sets on one side and regular sets on the other. The hamper looks great just sitting in the hall near the closet. It was a bit more than I'd usually pay for a hamper but I'm pleased with the purchase overall. While it appears to be sturdy, I rated 4 stars as sturdiness and durability will be determined over time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RJH

customer_reviews.title: This hamper is the best hamper I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is the best hamper I have ever owned. It is quite large and fits about 3-4 large loads of laundry for my boyfriend and I. It is beautiful and fits perfectly in my bathroom. It is very well made and seems like it will last a long time. The only issue I have with it is the price. I paid $160 for it which is a little steep I thing. About $80 to $100 would have been, in my opinion, a good price for this.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Scovelle

customer_reviews.title: Is a nice looking basket
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this basket. It feels strong enough to last for a while but I’m not sure how durable it is and I feel like it’s a little bit expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: EmCee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional Hamper
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously sturdy hamper that holds a lot of clothes and is beautiful and functional. I love the metal framing inside that gives it strength. The lid is attached firmly yet moves easily, and the side handles are very convenient when you need to move it. Love the simple way the liner bags hang inside. Great hamper!
customer_reviews.author: Sheepshuttle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made quality. Love this hamper. Speedy shipping - great service. Only one drawback. Had to send it back as it is to large for the spot it needs to go in. It cost me $23.40 for shipping. I like it so well I ordered the smaller version. I just assumed when I spent $159 for a laundry hamper that return shipping would be covered. Make sure you have a spot large enough for this when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: The last laundry hamper I will need!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how well made and sturdy this was compared to the previous hamper we had. Oversized is a plus, as are the removable liners which are machine washable. Pricey but worth it! Don’t let the price scare you away. Buy it, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hamper
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for a large size hamper and was divided between this one and a hamper from Williams Sonoma Home. The WS hamper was more expensive (same size and material) and I finally decided on this one. It is just what I was looking for - roomy, sturdy and attractive in my bedroom. It might be pricier than other hampers but it looks well made and not cheap. There is no assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and Function
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is beautiful, very sturdy and exactly as pictured. I was afraid it wouldn't hold up to heavy towels being added to it but it's very strong and well made. No problems whatsoever with the durability. It also looks absolutely stunning in my laundry room space. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: HJR

customer_reviews.title: Good choice, but not for small space
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition ready to go. It is large so be sure your space will accommodate its size. Two separate bags are removable, held by hooks along the top frame and so far all seems secure enough to hold a week's worth of laundry. I chose the espresso color and it is beautiful. There is variation in the color of the material so it blends with my eclectic light and darker woods.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Picus

customer_reviews.title: It is quite sturdy while being beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: This is a substantial piece of furniture. I say "furniture" because of its design. It is quite sturdy while being beautifully made. It is large so check the measurements for your needs. That the bags pull out for easy transfer to laundry is perfect. The attached lid is magnetized and is also quite sturdy. This piece looks just wonderful in my bedroom. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: They work great in one of our bathrooms and an open closet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the size and quality of this product. I ordered 2 of these. They work great in one of our bathrooms and an open closet we have. The look nice, are sturdy and hold enough dirty clothes for my family of 4 for our weekly (or sometimes bi-weekly) laundry. I also, received an incorrect canvas insert size in one of them, but the seller has been very pleasant to work with (see seller reviews) for the exchange to the corrected one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The hamper arrived promptly and in perfect condition. Great care was taken in the packaging to make sure this would be the case. I am thrilled with how beautiful it looks in our bedroom. It's so much fun to disguise a functional, mundane item like a laundry hamper Into a beautiful piece of home decor! Kudos!!
customer_reviews.author: martypants

customer_reviews.title: No dropping socks
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made sturdy hamper that I think will last a long time. I read other reviews that said people had trouble taking in and out the 2 bags. I think they come out easily and are quite handy to carry my items to the washer without dropping my socks all along the way. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kryka

customer_reviews.title: So worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased! This is exactly what I have been shopping for and now we have it! The two divided sections make laundry sorting much more convenient. The hamper itself is very well made. It is very attractive. We placed it in our upstairs hallway between two bathrooms and a bedroom to make reaching it handy. At first my husband was not thrilled about the price but after seeing it up close he realized the workmanship it definitely worth the price. Thank you for a beautiful product!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle A Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Just as described & worked great!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT quality, no funky smells, and brand new. Shipping was timely. Only downfall is the linen lining the basket slips off easily. The wooden rods need a stop on each end to solve that issue, otherwise its great.
customer_reviews.author: MJW45

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this hamper. Looks nice in my walk in closet. Only thing is that I wish it had a handle to lift the top. It’s very difficult to grasp and lift because the top is kinda heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great upscale piece.
customer_reviews.text: Great hamper. Can divide whites & colors. Matches the chair in bathroom also.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Really great hamper
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit pricey, this hamper is well-made, spacious and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Dapolito

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product. It’s really large. Especially for my husband who always gets his clothes dirty. It looks so nice in my bathroom. But you will need a large space. Made very well. I’m highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: G’s Wife

customer_reviews.title: Robust and good size
customer_reviews.text: Robust and good size. My wife used two different ones to separate the clothes since we need to change for new ones, I searched on Amazon and I found this excellent product, only one with a separation for the clothes solved me and it is also more robust, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MIANGO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a double hamper for our new bathroom and this one checks off all the boxes, sturdy, great size, great look and works perfect❣️
customer_reviews.author: this changed me

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Fits perfectly In my room. Looks great, built very well. It’s an item you will have for many years. I love this hamper because it’s big, not an eye soar, has a lid to keep clothes out of sight. You’ll love this item as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Solid!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a divided hamper, similar to something I bought at The Container place. This is larger, far more substantial (thicker "shell," much more sturdy) and exactly the right color. The interior canvas bags hang with wooden dowels and look as though they will launder easily. It's kind of hard to wax poetic about a hamper, but I must admit to being delighted with this purchase. Now if I can just train DH to put his laundry IN the hamper, instead of next to it ... 😄
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It's indeed great product. It came fast and in perfect conditions
customer_reviews.text: It's indeed great product. It came fast and in perfect conditions. The hamper holds a lot of laundry, enough for 2 weeks and 2 people. I'm super happy with this purchase, definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how it looks in pictures! Perfect! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Large Hamper
customer_reviews.text: The size of the hamper is perfect. The only complaint is the wooden rods that hold the laundry bag in place are difficult to keep in the bag loops.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer1234

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Hamper
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for several years and just now writing a review. This product has held up and has been wonderful. Very nice appearing in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far this hamper is great! Looks exactly like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: So far this hamper is great! Looks exactly like the pictures. Separating whites and darks makes laundry day that much easier. And the liner bags are very easy to pull out and bring over to the washing machine. I'll update this review if it gives me any trouble or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: No Divided Liners Included
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the Divided interior which keeps laundry sorted. Did not include the two machine washable cotton canvas liners.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Jantomaso

customer_reviews.title: I love this BirdRock oversized laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: I love this BirdRock oversized laundry hamper. It is great quality and is made really well. It has a lot of room and I love the two compartments and the removable laundry bags.
customer_reviews.author: ATA

customer_reviews.title: Really heavy chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Much uglier than expected. Has been treated with some kind of lacquer, so it's extremely shiny and has a horrible chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Claybaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good service
customer_reviews.text: The hamper is beautiful, and it arrived in great condition! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good look and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Good looking product. Removable bags make removal a breeze. Keeps the dirty laundry out of site.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeves

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hamper
customer_reviews.text: Well made hamper - and looks good too. I was replacing a metal rickety hamper so this is much more of an improvement. Each bag filled is just the right amount for a full load.
customer_reviews.author: Even Fable

customer_reviews.title: This hamper is amazing! A question I had before I bought is ...
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is amazing! A question I had before I bought is whether or not one side would be enough to fill a whole laundry load (most hampers and laundry bags I've seen are only 1/2 load big). The answer is yes! I do throw in a towel or 2 on the top before bringing it down to wash. One thing that I don't like about this hamper is that the wooden sticks fall through the loops too easily and take time to put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Vellani

customer_reviews.title: Sofia + Sam Oversized Divided Hamper
customer_reviews.text: My Oversized Divided Hamper is just what I had been looking for almost a year. It is sturdy, large enough for over a week's laundry for my husband and me, and very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Matthie

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is a great size. The large twin bins are wonderful. The dark brown is a lovely color. It came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry basket. I never thought I would spend this much money on a laundry basket however I have zero regrets. My wife and I now have our own compartments to hide our dirty underwear. Its is sturdy and quite easy on the eyes. Stop reading this review and just buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is in fact enormous - it's about the size of two normal hampers. Just what we were looking for! The double inserts are really nice and help keep the laundry manageable despite it's giant size. It looks nice as well. Chemical smell on opening went away after a few days of airing out and has not returned. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: As on picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and as expected. Durability remains to be seen - I use it only for one week now
customer_reviews.author: Anton Yuryev

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with how sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with how sturdy and well made. This hamper is. It looks just as pictured and has an enormous capacity. Looks beautiful and I'm so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: OCMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Holds 2+ machine loads of laundry. Well made. Looks nice in my laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy from Northshore

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The wicker is beautiful and sturdy. Matches perfectly with the other products I have bought from this line. Expensive, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lana L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice. A little pricey for my book
customer_reviews.text: Nice. A little pricey for my book. But it made my wife very happy. And that is always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Fits well in small areas and still plenty of room. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: DulceZ

customer_reviews.title: Good value should last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, attractive, bigger than I thought, but that is a good thing. I like the bags, hooks and dowels. Much sturdier than hampers that use velcro bag hangers.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's large and looks good. Holds a lot of clothes dark color like espresso with mixed in lighter color
customer_reviews.author: ice

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the house without looking like there’s dirty clothes in there. Goes with the decor of our house.
customer_reviews.author: jen s

customer_reviews.title: Not a pleasant smell!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I've given this enough time I've washed the liners so I know they are fine, the hamper still smells so bad of that wicker smell, and not the nice kind. I think it's because it was treated with something to make it stronger I don't know. I thought it would wear off with time, which is why I've delayed my review. I even left in the garage for a couple weeks to try to air it out in fresh air. The hamper itself is great, but I won't have this in my house because it makes my upstairs hall smell. Thus a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn Barker

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and is sturdy. So far so good. I don't anticipate any problems and feel it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Yonan

customer_reviews.title: beautiful warm-golden toned basket weave
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED!!! Handles on either side, beautiful warm-golden toned basket weave, washable liners inside, divided hamper for sorting, AND this one is about $30 less on cost vs the one at Pottery Barn!! I use this one for lights and darks but I might order another one for towels and hand washing or something! I hope they keep making this item for years to come. Timeless piece of beauty and function for the home.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this, it's huge and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this, it's huge and gorgeous. Fits several loads. I had a few issues with the metal piece that holds the hanging rods; it was bent too tight and is difficult to remove the wooden dowel / hanging rod. One of the hanging bags is ripped along the seam, but that is an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: MSOJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!!! It is perfect for what I was looking for. For cat owners, they love it too. Just to let other buyers know.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Roshoe

customer_reviews.title: I love my new laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laundry hamper. It's beautiful, sturdy and functional. My recommendation, don't wait, purchase Amozon Prime & get the hamper in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Vernae

customer_reviews.title: Great size and height
customer_reviews.text: Love this roomy hamper - separate dark/light clothes or his 'n hers ;) Item is a little darker than pictured but still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry storage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful laundry storage. Keeps dirty laundry out of view. Great for narrow spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hankinson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and holds a lot of laundry.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works well. Very roomy. I do wish the lid stayed open when you are getting out your clothes for laundering but I can live with it. Great hamper!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Love it, looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looks really nice, has held up well, its sturdy (my cat jumps on it all the time and it barely wobbles), and I like the two sides and easy to open/close lid make it super easy to sort all my family's laundry.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalDesigner

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive basket and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and good looking. The outter box had a puncture through it that slightly damaged the basket but fortunately it was in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Ise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this is by far the best clothes hamper I have ever had or seen. I have owned it for over 5 yrs and it still looks brand new. It is the only clothes hamper I have ever received compliments on, think about it Very sturdy beautifully conceived.
customer_reviews.author: T. Molique

customer_reviews.title: Well made hamper
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large hamper. Plenty of room for multiple loads. Easy to use handled liners. Seems very sturdy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: karen wilber

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and plenty of room for 2 loads
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Jo

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Product comes as is no assembly required including liners inside the basket. So far very happy with the products works well in the small apartment in which I live in. I definitely recommend if you're looking for a stylish basket for for your dirty laundry and don't have a proper laundry room to store your laundry and are forced to keep it in a bedroom etc.
customer_reviews.author: Roi Yeandel

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking piece of furniture in our bedroom for dirty ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and serves our purpose perfectly. It's a nice looking piece of furniture in our bedroom for dirty laundry. We use one side for machine washables and the other for dry cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Laundry is much easier and it doesn’t stand out like a regular hamper with dirty clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hamper, very nice company to work with
customer_reviews.text: This hamper came promptly and was really well packaged. These types of products can often come damaged, so it's really nice to receive one with inner packaging and shipped in a very sturdy cardboard box. The company followed up to make sure the product came and was delivered with no problems or issues. It is a lovely hamper that is very nicely made. It has two compartments with liners that come out for darks and lights. It is big enough to hold lots of laundry, and is very sturdy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: joanne knowlton gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper!! Used for a few weeks now & it seems like it will hold up perfectly. Love the look & that it holds a lot of clothes. I took a long time to order because of the price but I'm kicking myself because it has beautified an ugly corner of my home that I walked by 100 times a day. When I got over myself & ordered I was really hoping this hamper would work out & I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: tonyab1

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described, and came shipped with no assembly needed! It was shipped fully assembled in a large box, with no damage from shipping. It is nice, and much better than my plastic hampers.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Erika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's solid and very well-made. It's fairly heavy and seems like it will last for years. Big enough to fit a week's worth of laundry. The two removable linen bags that hang inside are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hamper
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is a nice, high quality piece in my bedroom. It looks pretty, holds a lot, and keeps the dirty clothes hidden!
customer_reviews.author: Silveroo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper! It looks like a piece of furniture when the lid is closed, and it is roomy and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Dont air your dirty laundry; hide it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hamper for 2.good lookinf enough to be out in view
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn Lepore Adams

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh I can't say enough great things! We recently bought a super oversized washer and dryer...but I was so annoyed that my hamper file up before I needed to do wash! This hamper easily holds a full week of clothes for our 3 person famiy! Beautiful design and extremely good quality!
customer_reviews.author: RobinLD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it - no surprises!
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised - no surprises, which is a very good thing. It looks good and it's very useful. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: A really great clothes hamper
customer_reviews.text: Seldom does a product arrive and it's actually better than you'd hoped. This was one of those times. The hamper is so beautifully crafted that I feel bad putting my dirty clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bentham @

customer_reviews.title: and we love it already
customer_reviews.text: We just received our Birdrock Home Oversized Hamper, and we love it already. It shipped in perfect condition and required no assembly on arrival. The bags are medium in size, approximately one load of laundry. It is a beautiful addition to our bedroom. We especially love that the lid keeps the dirty laundry out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. England

customer_reviews.title: High quality & holds a lot of clothes.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice & is high quality. I love the large capacity, but make sure you have enough room for it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small bathroom, sturdy, and love that the divider bags are easily removed for washing or transferring laundry!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Best-looking hamper I've ever had! Works great for my husband and I to each have a spot to put our dirty laundry but it's not an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: MEGFP

product_meta.title: BirdRock Home Oversized Divided Hamper with Liners (Espresso) - Made of Natural Woven Abaca Fiber - Organize Laundry - Cut-Out Handles for Easy Transport - Includes 2 Machine Washable Canvas Liners
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoKeep your laundry neat and organized with the Sofia + Sam Divided Hamper. The oversized hamper is hand-woven of natural, sustainable Seagrass or Abaca fibers and includes two removable cotton canvas liners.
feature_bullets: Espresso made of natural woven Abaca fiber; Honey made of natural woven Seagrass fiber
Divided interior keeps laundry sorted. Cut-out handles for easy transport
Includes two machine washable cotton canvas liners
Dimensions: 28 wide x 14 deep x 27 high
